C

Character - Class in main.model
the characters in the world the player is able to interact with
Character(String, int, int, String, int, int, String, Item) - Constructor for class main.model.Character
 
Character() - Constructor for class main.model.Character
 
CharacterTest - Class in test.model
unit tests for the character methods
CharacterTest() - Constructor for class test.model.CharacterTest
 
CharacterView - Class in main.view
view of a character
CharacterView(Character, MainController) - Constructor for class main.view.CharacterView
 
CharacterView.MouseEventHandler - Class in main.view
handles mouse clicks on a character
checkForCollision() - Method in class main.controller.MainController
Checks for a collision between the player and all items, objects and characters in the game
checkForCollisionWithCharacter(Character) - Method in class main.controller.MainController
Checks for a collision between the player and a character
checkForCollisionWithItem(Item) - Method in class main.controller.MainController
Checks for a collision between the player and an item placed somewhere in the world
checkForCollisionWithObject(Object) - Method in class main.controller.MainController
Checks for a collision between the player and an object (like a tree or a house) must be public, or otherwise unit test cannot access it (same for following methods)
close() - Method in class main.model.Object
Used if player closes an object, e.g. a door or a chest changes state of the object
